# About Author

![Profile photo](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

Filip was born in **Belgrade, Serbia (1995)**.  

There he finished a elementary school (2010), a gymnasium (2014) and graduated **(B.Sc.)** at the **Faculty of Mechanical engineering, University of Belgrade**.  

During his student years, he was a **teaching assistant at a faculty's subject** (Engineering's graphics) for 3 years, obtained a **certificat for CAD/CAM software (SolidWORKS)**   
and worked on two projects regarding engineering problems and solutions as well as implementing knowledge on a 3D models.  

Since year of 2004, Filip has been actively training volleyball, entered many competitions and got to the senior level.  
He played for the Faculty as well as for the representation of the University of Belgrade.  

His last two hobbies are playing a guitar and actively learning a HAM radio communications and operations.  

**Blog** that you will able to see **here represents Filip's master's thesis (M.Sc)**.  

For more info about Filip, please visit **[LinkedIn page](https://www.linkedin.com/in/filip-dragovic-ab9132182/)**
